meanings.definition: Three offspring born at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The triplets were all born on the same day.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the babies were triplets.
meanings.sent3: The triplets decided to wear matching outfits for fun.
meanings.sent4: Their bond was as strong as if they were triplets.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the triplets sleeping peacefully was heartwarming.

meanings.definition: A group of three similar things.
meanings.sent1: She bought a set of triplets: three identical candles.
meanings.sent2: The triplets of colors on the painting created a harmonious effect.
meanings.sent3: The triplets of flavors in the ice cream were a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The triplets of stars in the sky shone brightly that night.
meanings.sent5: The triplets of flowers in the vase added beauty to the room.

meanings.definition: A set of three related items or people.
meanings.sent1: The triplets of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: The triplets of siblings shared a special connection.
meanings.sent3: The triplets of songs in the playlist were her favorites.
meanings.sent4: The triplets of keys on the keychain were all important.
meanings.sent5: The triplets of paintings in the gallery were by the same artist.
